title: Trump "eventually learned" of porn star payment: WH
text:
Trump "eventually learned" of porn star payment: WH Thursday, May 03, 2018 - 01:14
U.S. President Donald Trump did not initially know that his personal lawyer had paid $130,000 to adult-film star Stormy Daniels but later learned about the payment, White House spokeswoman Sarah Sanders said on Thursday. Rough Cut (no reporter narration).
